name: Bearsus
description:
HIBERNATION IS OVER

Sharpen your claws and pick your furrocious fighter as you face impawsible odds with your bear hands. 

Taking the idea behind DiveKick of making a 2-button fighting game, add some bears, a few extra tweaks for more depth and an unbearable number of puns.

Although the game is BEARLY AN ALPHA, the game has an ever increasing litter of fighting game fans in its community.

The current build has one playable bear, El Poderoso and supports battles Vs CPU and Vs another local player.
Online matches can be played with the help of Parsec.

Don't worry, you won't need to claw a build out of us.
